channel.title: Art journal on obxium
channel.description: Recent content in Art journal on obxium

item.title: Compact Signatures
item.description: This is an idea for implementing a short-form unique identifier style string that is composed from a substring of the SHA 256 summary for your crypto art NFT media as part of an enhanced artist’s signature metadata.

item.title: NFTs on Kusama
item.description: Since announcing my release of art NFTs on Kusama, I have been getting some questions lately from other artists and those in the scene who are curious about Kusama.

item.title: RMRK Kusama Art NFTs
item.description: 2020.11.12 – I have created and released a limited edition art series as Kusama blockchain non-fungible tokens (NFTs) using the RMRK NFT specification. This entry shows off the work and describes in detail, the process used for minting the collection and individual NFTs.

item.title: My First Crypto Artwork
item.description: This is the true, but completely unremarkable story about the very first piece of art that I ever created to be freely exchanged in a crypto art marketplace.
